articles.title: Greetings to Ecuadorian President-elect
articles.content:
Greetings to Ecuadorian President-elect
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Lenin Moreno Garces upon his election as president of the Republic of Ecuador.
					 The message expressed belief that the relations between the two countries would favorably develop in the interests and desire of the peoples of the two countries and wished the president big success in his responsible work for the independent development of the country and the wellbeing of its people.

articles.title: Celebration meeting of Workers, Trade Union Members
articles.content:
Celebration meeting of Workers, Trade Union Members
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Workers and trade union members met at the Central Hall of Workers on Wednesday to celebrate the 24th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 A reporter and speakers noted at the meeting that leader Kim Jong Il settled the matter of basic political mode under socialism in a unique way as required by the times and the development of the revolution and made ceaseless visit to the frontline military posts and defence industrial bases until the last moments of his life to consolidate the country's military capability for self-defence.
					
					 They said that he published a number of works to guide the trade union to discharge its mission and duty as a dependable helper and supporter of the Workers' Party of Korea in the onward movement for building a powerful socialist nation.
					
					 They called upon all the officials and members of the trade union and other working people to hold Kim Jong Il high esteem as the sun of Juche for all ages and glorify his revolutionary career and Songun revolutionary feats.
					
					 They stressed the need to display the revolutionary stamina of the heroic Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist working class in this year's all-people general charge, rallied close around respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK Soccer Team Defeats Mongolian Team
articles.content:
DPRK Soccer Team Defeats Mongolian Team
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The first match between the Kigwancha team of the DPRK and the Mongolian Erchim team belonging to the Group I of the 2017 AFC Cup took place in Mongolia on April 4.
					 The Kigwancha team beat the Erchim team 3:0, thus getting three points like the April 25 team of the DPRK which won the Erchim team in Pyongyang in March.
					
					 The Kigwancha team and Erchim team are to play the second match in Pyongyang on May 31.

articles.title: Greening Brisk in Ryomyong Street of Pyongyang
articles.content:
Greening Brisk in Ryomyong Street of Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Greening is brisk in Ryomyong Street of Pyongyang, which is nearing completion.
					 Green belts have been garbed with lawns and trees and flowers and trees planted. Various kinds of flower gardens have been created.
					
					 Flower beds for individual flowerpots have been built with large flowerpots.

articles.title: Economic Development Made by Dint of Science and Technology in North Phyongan Province
articles.content:
Economic Development Made by Dint of Science and Technology in North Phyongan Province
Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Scientists and technicians in North Phyongan Province of the DPRK are promoting the economic development by successfully solving the sci-tech issues arising in modernizing production processes.
					 The provincial information and communications centre has achieved many successes in modernizing tele-communications. It has put the management and control of power equipment on a scientific basis and increased their durability.
					
					 The Sinuiju Chicken Farm is producing feed with the method of new microbial fermentation and increasing egg-laying rate and chicken production.
					
					 The provincial passenger service field of the province has established a new display system on long-distance bus service and put the transport control on a modern, scientific and IT basis, thus contributing to saving fuel oil and providing non-accident run.
					
					 The Sinuiju Cosmetics Factory is making new soap with natural functional material.

articles.title: Young Korean People Perform Great Feats in Annals of Revolution
articles.content:
Young Korean People Perform Great Feats in Annals of Revolution
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Young Korean people are fully displaying their revolutionary mettle in the drive for effecting great surge, including the construction site of Ryomyong Street.
					 They, masters of the youth power, have created new legendary tales about heroic youth, glorifying the Mallima era.
					
					 They have performed heroic feats in the whole course of the Korean revolution in hearty response to the call of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 In the postwar period, they completed the construction of the Haeju-Hasong railway extending over 80 kilometers only in 75 days.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung called the young builders of the railway project the first unit riding Chollima.
					
					 In the 1980s, young builders finished the construction of more than 250 km-long northern railway in five years despite the biting cold and ordeals.
					
					 During the Arduous March, the forced march, young people constructed the Youth Hero Motorway extending 40-odd kilometers as a monumental edifice in less than two years.
					
					 In the great era of Kim Jong Un, members of the Paektusan Hero Youth Shock Brigade built the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station by overcoming unfavorable natural and geographical conditions.

articles.title: Repeal of Confrontation Policy Is Demand of Era and Nation: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Repeal of Confrontation Policy Is Demand of Era and Nation: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, traitor Park Geun Hye was thrown into prison. This is the severe judgment of history and nation upon the traitor who grabbed the "presidential" chair and committed all sorts of misrule, corruption and irregularities, sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation with compatriots, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 However, the south Korean puppet conservative group make desperate efforts to pursue the policy of confrontation, sought by Park, in the next-term regime, the article says, adding:
					
					 The puppet conservative group are the one of traitors to be wiped out at once together with traitor Park as they try to persistently preserve the "policy toward the north", which was thrown into bottomless quagmire of history along with the destruction of the traitor, not content with their escalation of confrontation with the compatriots in the north and deterioration of the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 It is the unanimous demand of the south Korean people to put an end to the "policy toward the north" of the puppet conservative group who plunged the inter-Korean relations into a stalemate and escalated the danger of a war against the north to an extreme phase.
					
					 The puppet conservative group are now isolated at home and abroad, forsaken by the public as they dashed people's hope for peace through the enforcement of the confrontation policy and inflicted the constant danger of war upon them.
					
					 The south Korean people who drank to the dregs under the misrule of traitor Park Geun Hye are wishing for the improved relations, peace and stable life, not for confrontation and war between the north and the south.
					
					 Whoever goes against the aspiration and demand of the nation can never win support of the public but will face a miserable doom like traitor Park.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses Aggressive Nature of Japan
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses Aggressive Nature of Japan
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Days ago, the chief executive of Japan and the defense study group of the Liberal Democratic Party deliberated the military policy including the issue of capability for preemptive attack.
					 Experts of the International Affairs Institute of Japan claimed that the "Self-Defense Forces" (SDF) should now possess the military capability of a normal state beyond the nature for self-defense. Some media of Japan, taking issue with the surrounding situation, spread the opinion calling for Japan's possession of reasonable weapons and bolstering up its military power.
					
					 This shows that Japan chose it as its policy to have its own capability for preemptive attack and conduct a war of aggression, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Japan has emerged as an aggression force threatening the peace and security in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 After the appearance of the present Japanese ruling quarters, Japan is openly pushing ahead with the moves to turn it into a military power. The operation capability of the SDF has radically increased on the ground, sea and in the sky, cyber and other spheres and its arms and equipment are being rapidly modernized into the offensive ones.
					
					 It is the wild ambition of the present Japanese authorities to make the SDF the world-level elite forces and turn Japan into a militarist state for aggression which is able to conduct a war without dependence on the U.S.
					
					 Japan's ambition for reinvasion is going beyond the red-line.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are mulling implementing their long-cherished ambition for reinvasion by spreading the story of "nuclear and missile threats from the DPRK". They are noisily vociferating about the story of "nuclear and missile threats from the DPRK" to cover up the moves to bolster up the capability for preemptive strike with flowery words of "self-defence" and "guaranteeing security". 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should clearly understand that their tricky attempt at preemptive attack will drive Japan into the labyrinth of destruction. 
					
					 Japan's bid to turn it into a military giant and moves for reinvasion are as foolish as digging one's own grave.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Group for Floating Deceptive Story of "Provocation by North"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Group for Floating Deceptive Story of "Provocation by North"
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Days ago, Hwang Kyo An, puppet acting president of south Korea, cried out for "full preparations" to cope with the "serious nuclear and missile threats from the north." Han Min Gu, puppet defense minister of south Korea, and other brass hats of the military went round grounds for war drills against the north and forefront units to call for "not allowing any provocation."
					 Yun Pyong Se, puppet minister of Foreign Affairs, frequently visited outsiders to spread the "story about provocation by the north and threat from it" and under the pretext of it zealously solicited for cooperation in the moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article terms the "stories about provocation and nuclear threats from the north" much touted by the south Korean puppet group shameless sophism making profound confusing of right and wrong.
					
					 Nobody can fault the DPRK's bolstering up its war deterrent for self-defence as it is the exercise of the right to smash the U.S. nuclear threat racket against the DPRK and protect the dignity and sovereignty of the country, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers are the main culprit who are increasing the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Their reckless provocative moves to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK are the root cause disturbing peace and security of the Korean peninsula and threatening the destiny of the nation.
					
					 No matter how noisily the south Korean puppet group may advertise the "stories about provocation and nuclear threats from the north", they can not cover up their nature as criminals going frantic in the moves to bring disaster of a nuclear war to the nation in collusion with outside forces.
					
					 Their deceptive stories are nothing but awkward excuse to veil their attempt to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 Their frantic moves for confrontation with the compatriots backed by the deceptive stories are the last-ditch efforts of those who are at the door of doom.
					
					 Their stories can never go down with anyone.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns Aggressors and Provocateurs against Going Reckless
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns Aggressors and Provocateurs against Going Reckless
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Aggressors and provocateurs going reckless on the Korean peninsula are doomed to be forlorn wandering spirits, warns Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The DPRK makes no empty talk. It is its courage and spirit to do as it determined.
					
					 The DPRK has powerful strength to wipe out the U.S. in a moment. It has H-bomb which the world calls "absolute weaponry", various type smaller, lighter and diversified nuclear warheads and Korea-style powerful delivery means.
					
					 If the U.S. makes even the slightest provocation to hurt the DPRK, the latter will reduce to ashes not only the aggressors present in south Korea but also their base by dint of powerful preemptive attack without hesitation. This is the stand of the DPRK.
					
					 The powerful offensive means of the invincible Paektusan army are on the constant stand-by, keeping in the range of their strike the bases of the U.S. armed forces in south Korea and in the Pacific operational theatre and also the U.S. mainland. If we push a button, the bombs will be fired into the U.S. to reduce it to ashes. This is our warning. This will be an irrevocable fate the U.S. will suffer in its standoff with its rival, the selection of whom was made wrong at a wrong time.

articles.title: S. Korean Workers Call for Eliminating Evils
articles.content:
S. Korean Workers Call for Eliminating Evils
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean newspaper Nodong and Segye, more than 2,500 workers gathered from across south Korea to hold a rally outside the Jeju City Office on April 2 to mark the 69th anniversary of the April 3 Popular Uprising.
					 Speakers at the rally said that although Park Geun Hye was dismissed by the might of workers and other people, eliminating the years-old evils still remains an urgent task.
					
					 Noting that the evils has lasted for more than 70 years, as evidenced by the violation of spirit of the April 3 popular uprising, which was to build an independent unified state, by the U.S military administration, they called for elimination of the evils.
					
					 A resolution, read out at the rally, stressed that they would struggle to remove the pro-Japanese elements and the separatist system, realize peace in the Korean peninsula and check the moves for deploying THAAD and turning the Jeju Island into a military base.

articles.title: Large Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy from Cambodian King, Great Queen
articles.content:
Large Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy from Cambodian King, Great Queen
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- King Norodom Sihamoni and Great Queen Norodom Monineath Sihanouk of Cambodia sent large baskets of flowers to the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh on April 1 on the occasion of the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Upon authorization of the king and the great queen, a delegation of the Cambodian Ministry of Royal Palace led by Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister for Royal Palace and chairman of the Cambodian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, laid the floral baskets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was formed by the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea on March 21.
					 Dmitri Kostenko, chairman of the Russian Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to widely organize the introduction and dissemination and seminars on the revolutionary career and exploits of the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, his birth anniversary.

articles.title: Bulletin "Kim Il Sung, Great Man of Century" Issued in DR Congo
articles.content:
Bulletin "Kim Il Sung, Great Man of Century" Issued in DR Congo
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The DR Congolese preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun issued a bulletin "Kim Il Sung, great man of century" on March 26 to mark the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The bulletin said:
					
					 The history of mankind has recorded many great persons, but there has not been such a man like President Kim Il Sung who has received boundless reverence from all people for centuries.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung is the pioneer and leader of the era of independence as he founded the Juche idea, indicating the road for the progressive people to follow.
					
					 It was thanks to him that mankind greeted a new era of independence and the strong tide for global independence appeared in the arena of history.
					
					 The President was a distinguished veteran of the global politics who led the human cause of independence under the uplifted banner of independence against imperialism all his life.
					
					 He held a firm grip on the helm of independence and led the cause of independence against imperialism to victory without any vacillation despite the fierce turbulences of the global politics.
					
					 His life serves as one of a genuine internationalist.
					
					 The President was a peerless sage who impressed the world with his noble human love and virtue.
					
					 He had shown warm human love and unlimited tolerance embracing everybody not only for the Korean people.
					
					 Politicians of enemy states acknowledged his lofty personality.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung will always live in the hearts of mankind.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente ruso
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente ruso
Pyongyang, 5 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 4 un mensaje de condolencias al presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, en relacion con que un atentado dinamitero causo muchas perdidas humanas en el metro metropolitano de San Petersburgo.
					En su misiva, el remitente expreso profunda compasion y consuelo al destinatario y por su conducto, a las victimas y sus familiares.
					
					Deseo de todo corazon que se alivie cuanto antes la tristeza de los familiares de victimas y llegue la estabilidad a la ciudad.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente electo ecuatoriano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente electo ecuatoriano
Pyongyang, 5 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio hoy un mensaje de felicitacion a Lenin Moreno Garces por su eleccion como presidente de la Republica del Ecuador.
					 Convencido de que las relaciones entre los dos paises se desarrollaran positivamente conforme a los intereses y deseos de ambos pueblos, el remitente formulo votos por mayores exitos en las responsabilidades del destinatario por el desarrollo independiente del pais y el fomento del bienestar del pueblo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena aparicion de Japon como fuerza agresora
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena aparicion de Japon como fuerza agresora
Pyongyang, 5 de abril (ACNC) -- Hace unos dias, el mandatario y el grupo de estudio de defensa nacional del Partido Democratico Liberal de Japon deliberaron la politica militar consistente en la preparacion de la capacidad de ataque preventivo, entre otras cosas. 
					Por su parte, los especialistas del Instituto de Asuntos Internacionales del mismo pais insistieron en que las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" deben poseer la capacidad militar de un Estado normal liberandose del caracter de autodefensa. 
					
					Algunos medios de prensa difunden la opinion de que su pais debe tomar medidas para fortalecer las fuerzas armadas, inclusive la posesion de armamentos correspondientes, pretextando la situacion de la zona periferica. 
					
					Este hecho demuestra que el pais isleno politiza la preparacion de la capacidad de asestar el ataque preventivo y cumplir la guerra de agresion de modo independiente. 
					
					Revela asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este miercoles y continua:
					
					Japon emergio ya como fuerza agresora que amenaza la paz y seguridad de la region de Asia-Pacifico. 
					
					Despues de la aparicion del actual poder de Japon, se ha impulsado mas abiertamente la conversion en una potencia militar. 
					
					Se ha elevado incomparablemente la capacidad operacional de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" en la tierra, el mar, el aire y el espacio cibernetico y se modernizan velozmente los pertrechos de guerra con vistas al ataque.
					
					Las autoridades japonesas intentan convertir las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" en las de flor y nata de nivel mundial y convertir su pais en el Estado militarista y agresor capaz de cumplir la guerra sin depender de EE.UU. 
					
					Ya propaso su ambicion de nueva agresion.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses tratan de ponerla en practica difundiendo el rumor de "amenaza nuclear y de misil proveniente del Norte de Corea". 
					
					Su verdadera intencion es ocultar con palabras como "autodefensa" y "preservacion de seguridad" sus maniobras encaminadas a mejorar la capacidad de ataque preventivo. 
					
					La conversion en potencia militar y las tentativas de nueva agresion de ellos son la via de autodestruccion.
